settings.heading: Ultra Test
settings.content:
Ultra Test

Black Mamba's Ultra Test is a natural testosterone booster that helps bodybuilders achieve better results. The product supports testosterone production and increases muscle growth. Ultra Test combines magnesium activation technology with plant extracts. By activating the magnesium, it creates a unique synergy that facilitates the transportation of nutrients into cells. Ultra Test is must have if your want that EDGE in your training.

Benefits:

May Aid in Muscle GrowthMay Increase Bodybuilding ResultsTestosterone Production SupportPowerful Magnesium Activation Technology

Key Ingredients:

Magnesium- Studies have shown magnesium to be involved in improving athlete performance and boosting natural protein production.Tribulus Terrestris- May aid in improving athletic performance and circulatory functions.

settings.heading: Male Multivitamins
settings.content:
Men’s Multivitamin

As part of our Black Mamba line of dietary supplements, the Men's Multivitamin is our most popular multivitamin formulated specifically for a man's needs. It provides the essential vitamins and minerals needed every day in addition to antioxidants, which may help protect against cell damage caused by free radicals. With immune system and prostate support, this multivitamin is perfect for maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

Benefits:

Antioxidant Protection Against Free RadicalsRich Blend of Vitamins and MineralsProprietary Blend of Immune and Male Support IngredientsFormulated with Vitamins, Minerals, Energizers, and a Vitamin B ComplexImproves Prostate Health*

Key Ingredients:

Vitamin A- Promotes a healthy reproductive system and white blood cell production, leading to improved immunity.Folate- Aids in the production and maturing of red blood cells, as well as cell division and healthy cell growth.Biotin- Plays a key role in promoting healthy hair growth and preventing premature hair loss in the long run.

settings.heading: Creatine
settings.content:
Creatine (Pharmaceutical Grade)

If you’re serious about taking your fitness to the next level and achieving the body of your dreams, you can’t afford to settle for less. Put your pedal to the metal with our Black Mamba's blend of Pharmaceutical-Grade Creatine. With an above average dose of 5000mg, this dietary supplement will go above and beyond in reducing fatigue, improving your recovery, and keeping you pushing those limits longer than you ever thought you could.

Benefits:

Promotes Energy Production in Muscle CellsImproves High-intensity Workout PerformanceQuickens Muscle GrowthReduces FatigueMay Promote Focus and Brain Function 

Key Ingredient:

Creatine- Helps the muscles recover more quickly during exercise, increase lean muscle mass, and improves strength. It also prevents premature fatigue and promotes higher energy levels in muscle cells.
